heroText: We craft optimal solutions for website design, responsiveness and performance
aboutText: Our expertise lies in crafting custom web designs and development solutions tailored for small businesses across the United States. We meticulously hand-code every aspect to guarantee optimal performance, ultimately driving increased traffic and revenue to your website.
aboutCardOneText: Your website is optimized to perfectly fit screens of all sizes, including those of mobile devices, tablets, and desktop computers.
aboutCardTwoText: We optimize your website to perform its best in search engines. It helps users find your website easier.
aboutCardThreeText: We develop web applications with back-end support, like e-commerce websites, rest API-s, and even simple online games.
pricingNote: NOTE: Any additional feature, page and product is charged more
pricingCardOneText: We provide you with a standard 5-page website
pricingCardThreeText: We design custom graphic logos and social media posts
pricingCardThreeFirstItem: We customize until you are satisfied
projectsText: We present you a collection of our latest web development projects. From dynamic e-commerce platforms to sleek corporate websites, our projects demonstrate the fusion of design, functionality, and user experience.
contactText: Partner with us to elevate your online presence and unlock the full potential of your company's digital footprint
contactFail: There was an issue sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly at info@saltcitysystems.com
tuzlaTaxiText: This client project for a local taxi company in Tuzla delivers seamless booking experiences. Our website allows customers to conveniently book taxis through a user-friendly form. Leveraging our expertise, we optimized the site to ensure a smooth booking process and significantly enhanced the client's online presence.
afarmText: We Developed a comprehensive Next.js e-commerce site for a herbal pharmacy. The site features a wide range of herbal products categorized by various health concerns, enabling customers to easily find natural remedies for their needs. Leveraged Next.js for a smooth and dynamic user experience.
